issue.title: [CF 40] Can't update from v1.2 to v2.0
issue.body:
My previous version (according to the saved variables file) was 1.2.0.
I'm trying v2.0.0 beta 5.

I get this error at login:

Message: ..\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua line 579:
   attempt to index field 'p' (a nil value)
Debug:
   [C]: ?
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:579: TellMeWhen_Group_Update()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:446: TellMeWhen_Update()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:193:
      TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:187

When the variables load, I get this error:

Message: ..\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua line 337:
   attempt to index local 'group' (a nil value)
Debug:
   [C]: ?
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:337: TellMeWhen_SafeUpgrade()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:223: TellMeWhen_VarsLoaded()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:189:
      TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:187

Updating the saved variables from v1.2.0 to 1.5.4 (using release version 1.5.4) works fine.


> Posted by CurseForge user PrimalZed | Imported from CurseForge issue #40 | Raw
